Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are confident it would be worth every penny to you. Considering its worth to you is $12,000, I propose to offer it to you for $11,500. This price reflects our commitment to providing high-quality products while also considering your expectations. Should you decide to accept this offer, we assure you of prompt delivery and excellent customer service. We look forward to serving you soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
